channel.title: 562 Webclient
channel.description:
So I was trying to make a 562 webclient, I jarred it and also, yes the input directory was set to bin, but it just opens, tells me it is loading, then the red loading box moves to the top left corner and closes. I get this error in the batch file i used to open it: [code=BATCH] THIS BATCH IS FOR DEBUGGING THE EXECUTABLE JAR ONLY DOUBLE-CLICK THE "client.jar" TO RUN IT - Generated by: JAR Maker (http://www.goldenstudios.or.id/)
C:\Documents and Settings\Caden\Desktop>java -jar client.jar java.lang.NullPointerException at Class_x.a(Class_x.java:22) at Class_t.<init>(Class_t.java:12) at Class_x.a(Class_x.java:182) at Class_gd.a(Class_gd.java:150) at Class_sc.a(Class_sc.java:84) at client.j(client.java:2303) at client.d(client.java:680) at Class_a.c(Class_a.java:271) at Class_a.run(Class_a.java:693) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . . [/code]

item.title: 562 Webclient
item.dc:creator: @Mill Mill
item.description:
@Mill wrote:

So I was trying to make a 562 webclient, I jarred it and also, yes the input directory was set to bin, but it just opens, tells me it is loading, then the red loading box moves to the top left corner and closes. I get this error in the batch file i used to open it:

THIS BATCH IS FOR DEBUGGING THE EXECUTABLE JAR ONLY
DOUBLE-CLICK THE "client.jar" TO RUN IT
-
